zh-Hant_definition: 供給身體能量與營養的物質
example_sentence: We enjoy a lot of food at the Christmas dinner.

zh-Hant_definition: 控制思考、感覺和行動的器官
example_sentence: The brain receives signals from the gut after a meal.

zh-Hant_definition: 閉上眼睛休息，使身體和大腦恢復活力
example_sentence: Many people feel sleepy and want to sleep after a big lunch.
A festive meal can contain turkey, potatoes and dessert.
Hunger makes us look for food quickly.

zh-Hant_definition: 身體活動所需要的力量或活力
example_sentence: Carbohydrates give us quick energy after we eat.

zh-Hant_definition: 包括所有器官和組織的整體
example_sentence: The body works hard to keep blood sugar stable.

zh-Hant_definition: 對某個主題進行的系統性調查
example_sentence: A new study looked at how overeating affects metabolism.

zh-Hant_definition: 在身體裡流動的液體，運送氧氣和營養
example_sentence: After the pizza, their blood sugar did not rise much.

zh-Hant_definition: 甜味的碳水化合物，提供快速能量
example_sentence: Too much sugar can raise blood glucose levels.

zh-Hant_definition: 提供能量且儲存在身體的營養素
example_sentence: High‑fat foods are often part of holiday feasts.
I feel sleepy after eating a large dinner.

zh-Hant_definition: 對身體有益的、沒有疾病的
example_sentence: A balanced diet helps keep you healthy.

zh-Hant_definition: 一段時間內的情緒或心情
example_sentence: Hunger can change your mood and make you irritable.
